name: Into The Light (itch) (Fairy Bound)
description:
Fairy Bound a is group dedicated to fun and story first driven games that bring you into fairy tale worlds that are bound to be fun. We bring you “Into The Light”, a free game Demo we made during Ludum Dare. This time we bring you into a Lovecraft horror inspired world, where you literally and metaphorically, as a player go Deeper and Deeper into madness. 

Sound Track by
__KJ__

Lead Sound Engineer
__Cedric Swan__

Artist/Programmer/Project Lead:
__William Brines__

Be warned the is not much here except 1 room some movement and ambiance. This was just what we could put to gather for the jam.
Controls WASD
